incidents.name: Our Engineers are Investigating an Issue with Authy API

incident_updates.body: Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with Authy API; Increased number of 500 errors . We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.

incidents.name: Console users unable to access the My Accounts and Project Summary pages

incident_updates.body: Twilio Console is now operating normally; view and navigate to their accounts in the My Accounts and Project Summary pages. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue: unable to see the projects in the my accounts section in Console. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: On Call Engineers are Investigating an issue

incident_updates.body: This issue affecting Voice SDK Insights gateway errors has been mitigated, and it's describe as a retroactive incident at the link below: https://status.twilio.com/incidents/7j5rd36c097k

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Voice SDK events logging. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Voice SDK/Insights Gateways affected

incident_updates.body: Twilio Voice SDK/Insights Gateway was degraded for 30 minutes between 12:49 pm and 1:20pm Pacific Time on 10/24/2024. During this period of time, customers may have experienced errors returned from the Voice SDK insights gateway. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Concatenated SMS Traffic Towards US Cellular for a Subset of Short Codes was Garbled

incident_updates.body: Between 01:30 AM PT until 12:34 PM PT today, concatenated SMS traffic towards US Cellular for a subset of short codes was inadvertently affected after work was performed by the mobile operator. Some messages may have arrived garbled. In order to mitigate the issue, the concatenation feature was disabled on traffic towards US Cellular, for impacted shortcodes. We are actively working with US Cellular to resolve this issue as quickly as possible, so concatenation can be re-enabled.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, APAC

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in receiving message delivery reports when sending to the Beeline Network Russia. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, APAC

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing delays in receiving message delivery reports when sending to the Beeline Network Russia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, APAC

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing delays in receiving message delivery reports when sending to the Beeline Network Russia. incident_updates.body: We are experiencing delays in receiving message delivery reports when sending to the Beeline Network Russia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, APAC

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with SMS delivery receipt delays when sending to the Beeline Network Russia. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Users Unable to Add Decimals During Account Billing Top-Ups

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing the issue causing customers to be unable to add decimal values during account billing top-ups. This incident has been resolved.

affected_components.name: TWILIO PLATFORM - Billing

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to investigate an issue where users are unable to add decimal values during account billing top-ups. As a temporary workaround, please consider rounding up the payment amount to the nearest whole currency unit. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: TWILIO PLATFORM - Billing

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to investigate an issue where users are unable to add decimal values during account billing top-ups. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to investigate an issue where users are unable to add decimal values during account billing top-ups. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incident_updates.body: We are investigating an issue where users are unable to add decimal values during account billing top-ups. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: TWILIO PLATFORM - Billing

incident_updates.body: We've become aware of a potential issue with Account Billing top-ups. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

affected_components.name: TWILIO PLATFORM - Billing

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures from Twilio Short Codes and Toll Free Numbers to AT&T Network in the US

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing the issue causing SMS delivery failures from Twilio Short Codes and Toll Free numbers to the AT&T Network in the US. This incident has been resolved.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America

incident_updates.body: We are observing successful SMS delivery from Twilio Short Codes to AT&T Network in the US.  We will continue to monitor to ensure full service recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to experience SMS delivery failures from Twilio Short Codes and Toll Free numbers to AT&T Network in the US. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America

incident_updates.body: We are continuing our investigation and have discovered Twilio Toll Free numbers are also impacted with this issue.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery failures from Twilio Short Codes to AT&T Network in the US. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery failures from Twilio Short Codes to AT&T Network in the US. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Programmable Messaging. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays from Twilio Tollfree Numbers to AT&T Network in the US

incident_updates.body: Our Engineers have detected multiple network degradations over AT&T in the US. For that reason, we have merged this incident with the one for failures via Short codes. For the latest updates, please refer to our ongoing Status updates here: https://status.twilio.com/incidents/jnf8mp4mfj1b

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays from Twilio Tollfree numbers to AT&T Network in the US. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
